TableField.name: EntryPermitID
TableField.phrase: Record ID|An automatically assigned number used to track confined space entries and associated permits

TableField.name: JobNumber
TableField.phrase: Job Number|The unique number assigned to the job requiring confined space entry. This number is typically assigned by an engineering or maintenance dapartment

TableField.name: PermitNumber
TableField.phrase: Permit Number|The unique number assigned to the permit used for space entry and placed at the entrance to the space during the performance of entrance activities. The permit ID can be used as the permit number because it is a unique, automatically generated, numbering system

RemoteField.name: EntryTime
RemoteField.phrase: Entry Date|The date and time the confined space was entered

TableField.name: EntryShiftID
TableField.phrase: Entry Shift|The shift during which the confined space was entered

CodeField.name: EntryShift
CodeField.phrase: Entry Shift|The shift during which the confined space was entered

RemoteField.name: ExpirationTime
RemoteField.phrase: Expiration Time|The date and time the confined space entry permit will expire and no longer be valid to permit the entry into the confined space

TableField.name: ConfinedSpaceID
TableField.phrase: Confined Space|A description of the confined space based on a combination of field values assigned from within the confined space module

ForeignField.name: OrganizationID
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization where the confined space exists

ForeignField.name: Organization
ForeignField.phrase: Organization|The name of the organization where the confined space exists

ForeignField.name: LocationID
ForeignField.phrase: Location|Specific area within the facility where the confined space is located

ForeignField.name: Location
ForeignField.phrase: Location|Specific area within the facility where the confined space is located
ForeignField.sample: Cold Storage Receiving Area; Cold Storage No. 6

ForeignField.name: ConfinedSpaceTypeID
ForeignField.phrase: Confined Space Type|A combined field used to describe this confined space type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: ConfinedSpaceCategoryID
ForeignField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group confined spaces of similar types

CodeField.name: ConfinedSpaceCategory
CodeField.phrase: Category|A broad categoy used to group confined spaces of similar types

ForeignField.name: ConfinedSpaceType
ForeignField.phrase: Confined Space Type|A combined field used to describe this confined space type when associating it with other records

ForeignField.name: LastReviewDate
ForeignField.phrase: Last Review|The date of the last formal review of the confined space

ForeignField.name: ConfinedSpace
ForeignField.phrase: Confined Space|A description of the confined space based on a combination of field values assigned from within the confined space module
ForeignField.sample: Mix Tank | Ice Cream Mix Tank Number 7 | Active Agenda, HQ

ForeignField.name: ConfinedSpaceDesc
ForeignField.phrase: Description|A detailed description of this confined space and any special characteristics associated with entry or egress
ForeignField.sample: The mix tank has an internal augar which must be shut off and controlled before entry. Entry without shutting down the augar could result in death.

RemoteField.name: PermitIssuedByID
RemoteField.phrase: Permit Issued By|The name of the person issuing the confined space entry permit

ForeignField.name: PermitIssuedBy
ForeignField.phrase: Permit Issued By|The name of the person issuing the confined space entry permit

TableField.name: Explanation
TableField.phrase: Explanation|An explanation of the confined space entry to be performed
TableField.sample: The mix tank must be sanitized every 3 days. Sanitation of the mix tank requires that a person enter the access hatch at the top of the tank and disassemble the mix augar so that the augar blades may be cleaned and sanitized

TableField.name: KeyLearnings
TableField.phrase: Key Learnings|Information learned during the confined space entry which may be useful to others performing similar confined space entries in the same or similar area
TableField.sample: The mix augar should be locked out before entering the mix tank. The augar was not locked out and became energized while I was inside the tank. Fortunately someone heard me screaming as I jumped over the augar blade.

TableField.name: SpecialHazards
TableField.phrase: Special Hazards|Special confined space entry hazards that should be captured and recorded for default permits so that all persons performing similar entries will be aware of the dangers
TableField.sample: The mix augar switch is mislabeled as the 'Intercom Switch' and can result in inadvertent activation of the mix augar by people trying to use the intercom.

RemoteField.name: SupervisorID
RemoteField.phrase: Supervisor|The supervisor of the area immediate to the location where the confined space entry is to occur

ForeignField.name: Supervisor
ForeignField.phrase: Supervisor|The supervisor of the area immediate to the location where the confined space entry is to occur

RemoteField.name: EntryPersonID
RemoteField.phrase: Entry Person|The qualified person assigned responsibility for entering the confined space

ForeignField.name: EntryPerson
ForeignField.phrase: Entry Person|The qualified person assigned responsibility for entering the confined space

RemoteField.name: AttendantID
RemoteField.phrase: Attendant|The name of the person assigned to attend the confined space entry and maintain contact with the entrant. The attendant is also responsible for maintaining contact with emergency responders and initiating emergency response activities if the entry person encounters difficulties

ForeignField.name: Attendant
ForeignField.phrase: Attendant|The name of the person assigned to attend the confined space entry and maintain contact with the entrant. The attendant is also responsible for maintaining contact with emergency responders and initiating emergency response activities if the entry person encounters difficulties

RemoteField.name: AtmosphereTesterID
RemoteField.phrase: Atmosphere Tester|The name of the person conducting atmosphere testing and monitoring of the environment within the confined space

ForeignField.name: AtmosphereTester
ForeignField.phrase: Atmosphere Tester|The name of the person conducting atmosphere testing and monitoring of the environment within the confined space

RemoteField.name: ERTMemberID
RemoteField.phrase: Emergency Response Team Member|The name of the emergency response team member that has been contacted in advance of the entry and who remains available in the event that a confined space rescue becomes necessary

ForeignField.name: ERTMember
ForeignField.phrase: Emergency Response Team Member|The name of the emergency response team member that has been contacted in advance of the entry and who remains available in the event that a confined space rescue becomes necessary

ForeignField.name: ContactNumbers
ForeignField.phrase: ERT Contact Numbers|The contact numbers for the emergency response team member

ForeignField.name: FullWorkPhone
ForeignField.phrase: Work Phone|The work phone number of the emergency response team member

ForeignField.name: MobilePhone
ForeignField.phrase: Mobile Phone|The mobile phone number of the emergency response team member

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes
CombinedField.sample: CSE113; 09-21-2003; Mix Tank; Active Agenda, HQ

CombinedField.name: EntryPermit
CombinedField.phrase: Entry Permit|A combined field used to describe this entry permit when associating it with other records
CombinedField.sample: CSE113; 09-21-2003; Mix Tank; Active Agenda, HQ

Mix Tank | Ice Cream Mix Tank Number 4 | Active Agenda, HQ

ViewScreen.name: View
ViewScreen.phrase: View|View summary information about a confined space entry permit

EditScreen.phrase: Form|Edit summary information about a confined space entry permit

EditScreen.name: Assignment
EditScreen.phrase: Assignments|Assign people with confined space entry responsibilities

EditScreen.name: Accountability
EditScreen.phrase: Accountability|Associate participants with ongoing accountabilities with the confined space entry permit

EditScreen.name: Involvement
EditScreen.phrase: Involvement|Associate participants involved with the confined space entry permit

EditScreen.name: BestPractices
EditScreen.phrase: Best Practices|Associate best practices with the confined space entry permit

RecordReportScreen.name: RecordReports
RecordReportScreen.phrase: Reports|View forms and reports associated with confined space entry permits

ViewField.name: KeyLearnings
ViewField.sample: The mix augar should be locked out before entering the mix tank. The augar was not locked out and became energized while I was inside the tank. Fortunately someone heard me screaming as I jumped over the augar blade.

PieChart.title: Entry Permits By Confined Space Type

ParetoChart.title: Entry Permits By Confined Space Type

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.

DocumentationSection.title: Implementation
DocumentationSection.p: Installation-specific implementation rules, policies, practices should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said about implementating this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
